description:
http://anidb.net/ch8995 [Joe], a teenage orphan in the slums of the Doya streets, meets http://anidb.net/ch40307 [Danpei], a homeless, alcoholic ex-boxing coach. Danpei, seeing Joe`s boxing talent, decides to train him. When Joe is sent to a terrible juvenile home for petty crimes, he meets Rikiishi who becomes his boxing rival. Danpei arrives at the home to help Joe to train in order to defeat Rikiishi. When Joe decides to seriously pursue boxing, Danpei cannot get a coaching licence because of his reputation as a drunk.
Source: AnimeNfo

titles.title: Are ga Yajuu no Me Da!

熱きこぶしに涙をながせ!

Burn in the Depths of Hell!

Has the KO Gong Sounded Yet?

翔[はば]たけプロボクサー
The Path to the Shining Ring
The Greatest Six-Round Match of All Time
勝利のトリプルクロス
Bring Him Down! Learning Sway Backs Against Rikiishi
Datou! Rikiishi e no Sway Back
打倒! 力石へのスェイバック
The Man Who Made a Wager with Death
That Dirty Son of a Gun

帰えれ, 輝くリングへ
よみがえるクロスカウンター
リングの魔術師カーロス
To the Death! Carlos vs Joe Yabuki.
死闘!! カーロス対矢吹丈
A Distant, Dazzling Tomorrow, Burning Bright!
燃えろ 遠く輝ける明日よ!!
